description: The problem is an OverflowError when trying to use the re.findall() function to parse a large string. The string is too large for the re.findall() function to handle, resulting in an OverflowError.
code:
import re

string = '''This is a very long string with many characters that is too long for the re.findall() function to handle. It will cause an OverflowError.'''

re.findall('\w+', string)
